text:
We are committed to the health & wellbeing of our fellow citizens & supporting the efforts of our health practitioners. YES BANK commits INR 10 Cr to PM CARES Fund, towards COVID-19 relief & rehabilitation efforts. #YESforYOU
@PMOIndia
